title: client chat not working
body:
My game was running fine until after the 7.24 patch by 2-3 days it wont connect to chat
while im in client it doesnt connect and also champ select, but when im in-game the chat is working and there is some lag/jitter
i tried every a solution in the **Troubleshoot Connection Issues** but none of them worked and i also tried the** Hextech Repair Tool** but that doesnt work too, i've had this problem for probably a week now...

replies.body: Your connection has to reach different services around the client, pvp.net and chat services are just one of them.  You did good to run through the connection guide, though it's a bummer it hasn't helped.  I recommend double checking any blocks from firewall or antivirus settings, but you can also grab the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can check this out with you individually and find some more options.
